name: Witch Duck
description:
As Witch Island caretaker, I'm required to collect the wandering brooms. Thankfully, it's easy to locate them. The island is little more than an acre and covered in rabbits and chickens. Each of the witches have their house here. But I'm not alone, there is something out there.

   Explore the hilly topography in the chilly snow and light fog. You can even go inside the houses. But trying to escape by water won't work. You are trapped here on the island.
